entities.name: st mungo's hospital for magical maladies and injuries
entities.description: The hospital where Harry is being treated. It is mentioned as a place where wizards and witches go to receive treatment for their magical ailments.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story. He is being treated at St Mungo's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries.

entities.name: everard
entities.description: Everard is a wizard who has reappeared on the wall to inform Dumbledore of something.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is being informed by Everard. He seems to be in charge or at least knowledgeable about what's going on.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends and is present with him at St Mungo's Hospital.

entities.name: dilys
entities.description: Dilys is a wizard who has seen someone arrive at the hospital. Dumbledore seems to be expecting this information from Dilys.

relationships.description: Everard informs Dumbledore of something he heard.
Dilys is expected to inform Dumbledore about someone's arrival at the hospital.
